segments.text: I'm afraid I spilled coffee on the tablecloth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , never mind . I am just going to do the laundry today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to apologize . Is there anything can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It really doesn't matter at all . I never did like it anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
